html.description: The root element of an HTML document.

head.description: Contains metadata and links to external resources.

title.description: Sets the title of the document (shown in the browser tab).

attributes.rel: Relationship between the current document and the linked resource.

style.description: Contains CSS styles for the document.

body.description: Contains the content of the document.

h1-h6.description: Defines headings from largest (h1) to smallest (h6).

attributes.href: URL of the page the link goes to.
attributes.target: Specifies where to open the linked document.

div.description: Defines a division or section in the document.

tr.description: Defines a row in a table.

td.description: Defines a cell in a table.

th.description: Defines a header cell in a table.

attributes.action: URL where the form data will be sent.

attributes.onclick: JavaScript function to run when clicked.
